places_with_reviews.name: ARULMIGU SRI BANNARIAMMAN TEMPLE
places_with_reviews.address: National Highway 209, Sathyamangalam Taluk, Erode District, Bannari, Talamalai R.F., Tamil Nadu 638401, India

reviews.text: This temple is very famous and has good vibrations. and a good Maintenance like drinking water, the restroom is there. at the same  time it is a very peaceful place.

Very Famous Temple in Tamilnadu. Bannari Mariyamman Temple located in border of Tamilnadu & Karnataka so Lot of Karnataka people also visit here. All Lorry & Truck Drivers cross here make Pooja in this Temple. Marriage Occurs here. Group of
People visit and Goat & Hen cut here for god and make cook and eat.
There are huge parking Place available here. Mandabam also available. Limited shops only. Around the temple fully forest area.
Buses available from Sathiyamangalam.
Famous Festival is Agni Kundam falls in Every Year March Month End.
Must visit temple after getting down from Dhimbham ghats or before going up. Blessings from the Goddess is a must for any trip towards this side

As of Jan 2024, the rajagopuram work is going on, and it will take a few years to get completed.
Very vast temple and very vast space around the temple. Car parking is available.
From free darhsan to paid darshan like Rs.15, Rs.30 and Rs.50 are there. Very crowded during weekends and special days. Very neatly routed on all the paths. They give puthu mann (sand) as prasadam. Daily after 5.30 pm pooja, Golden charriot will be run once with security. Need to pay in advance for the same.
Salt and pepper kundam is there. Many are worshiping on the same, just like vanabadrakaliamman temple in Mettupalayam.
Tonsure can also be done near the original statue which is near riverside.
Annadhanam is provided. We can also donate for the same.

For newcomers:

-> car parking available
-> restroom available
-> lactation room available
-> annadhanam was there at the time of writing this (11 nov 2023, 13:14)

Review:

The temple is usual, nothing special. But the traveling part is amazing. Roads are smooth, best place to cruise. The temple is located in a forest kinda place where there are frequent speed breaks due to animal activities. Good place for devotional enthus, i would not recommend this place for non-devotional persons but overall this is a 3/5 star place.
